content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    b.[timestamp]
    ,b.[message] 
    ,c.*
FROM (
    SELECT 
        jsonContent
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/iss-position/raw/serverless/**',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
            FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
        )
        WITH (
            jsonContent varchar(MAX)
        ) AS [result]
    ) AS a
    CROSS APPLY
    OPENJSON(a.jsonContent) WITH (
        [timestamp]     BIGINT
        ,[message]      VARCHAR(20)
        ,[iss_position] nvarchar(max) AS JSON
    ) AS b
    CROSS APPLY
    OPENJSON(b.[iss_position]) WITH (
        latitude    VARCHAR(20)
        ,longitude  VARCHAR(20)
    ) AS c
